Academic Integrity in AI Tool Usage: Do not use AI generative tools to produce reflective writing assignments (e.g., journals, reflective essays).
Do not use AI generative tools to generate references or citations due to risks of inaccuracy or fabrication.
Do not submit AI-generated content that is inaccurate, biased, offensive, or unethical, regardless of authorship.
Cite the use of AI tools in assignments to avoid academic misconduct charges.
Do not submit AI-generated or third-party work as your own without proper attribution (plagiarism).
